Summary: White flash, minute later white flash further south, once again white flash south.
divs: Sighting Detailswhite flash just like a camera, first flash and second flash was a minute differant then the third flash came aboutn 40 seconds later. north to south. and then we didnt see anything after that. we were in the driveway facing east looking for shooting stars. we noticed the object looking around and seeing a flash. we have no idea what it was when we first noticed it. our reaction was: wondering what it was. the object stopped flashing.
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Brighton
There were no other sightings in Brighton on or around July 29th 2010
